data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Atletico have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Real Madrid's area.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luka Modric of Real Madrid gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 6, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Atletico a goal kick.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
In the minute 10, Real Madrid's Karim Benzema misses with an attempt on goal.
Real Madrid are pushing forward but Karim Benzema's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
In the minute 12, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Real Madrid in Madrid.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 15, Real Madrid move into a 1-0 lead through a Casemiro header.
That's a fine assist from Toni Kroos.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Atletico.
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Atletico throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Atletico throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 25, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 30, Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Atletico at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 34, Can Real Madrid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 36, At Estadio Alfredo di Stefano, Casemiro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico in Madrid.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Real Madrid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Atletico.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
The first-half is over at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
In the minute 45, The away team replace Hector Herrera with Renan Lodi.
Thomas Lemar is replacing Felipe for the away team.
Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a third substitution, with Angel Correa replacing Yannick Carrasco.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thomas Lemar (Atletico) has received a yellow card from Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 47, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Casemiro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Throw-in Atletico.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Real Madrid.
Casemiro is back on his feet again.
Angel Correa (Atletico) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 51, Real Madrid are in shooting range from this free kick.
Real Madrid drive upfield and Sergio Ramos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico defender.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
In the minute 52, Real Madrid are coming forward and Ferland Mendy gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 53, Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Atletico's Thomas Lemar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 55, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows against Atletico's Joao Felix for offside.
In the minute 58, Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Diego Simeone is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano with Saul Niguez replacing Joao Felix.
In the minute 61, Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Free kick Real Madrid.
In the minute 61, Stefan Savic for Atletico has been booked by Antonio Mateu Lahoz and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Real Madrid in the half of Atletico.
Jan Oblak blunders with an own goal. This makes it 2-0.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Real Madrid.

Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Real Madrid.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the away team a throw-in.

Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Atletico throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Geoffrey Kondogbia is replacing Luis Suarez for Atletico at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 76, Atletico's Saul Niguez misses with an attempt on goal.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 77, Atletico to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
The home team have replaced Vinicius Junior with Rodrygo. This is the first substitution made today by Zinedine Zidane.
Marco Asensio is on a sub for Dani Carvajal for Real Madrid.
In the minute 81, In Madrid, Saul Niguez (Atletico) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Atletico throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
In the minute 83, Atletico are pushing forward but Thomas Lemar's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Atletico.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Real Madrid make their third substitution with Federico Valverde replacing Luka Modric.
Atletico are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Atletico at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano.
Real Madrid drives forward and Lucas Vazquez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
That's full-time at Estadio Alfredo di Stefano. The final score is 2-0.
